short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickVision for ChatGPT: Instant Screenshot Sharing & Custom Prompts. Elevate your GPT-4 interactions with this Chrome extension…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickVision for ChatGPT: Instant Screenshot Sharing & Custom Prompts. Elevate your GPT-4 interactions with this Chrome extension designed for ChatGPT Plus users. Quickly share screenshots and personalize your AI chats with custom prompts. Experience enhanced, intelligent conversations with QuickVision – Your gateway to dynamic AI engagement.

Note: A ChatGPT Plus account is required to use QuickVision, as Chatgpt Vision is available only for GPT-4 users.

Key Features:

- Fast Screenshot Sharing: Quickly select, capture, and automatically send screenshots to ChatGPT, streamlining your workflow and enhancing visual discussions.

- Practical Custom Prompts: Easily set and save a custom prompt, eliminating the need to repeat them and making your ChatGPT sessions more convenient and tailored.

- Automatic ChatGPT Integration: Seamlessly embeds into the ChatGPT interface with GPT-4, offering a smooth, intuitive experience without manual setup.

- No Extra Tokens Needed: Enjoy all features without additional costs. Requires only a ChatGPT Plus account, as Chatgpt Vision is exclusively available for GPT-4 users.
